name: Robotics Exhibition by Robotics and Artificial Intelligence Foundation

tabs.title: Description
tabs.content:
Ever wanted to meet the mighty Jarvis? 

Ever given your eyeteeth to meet the Atom from Real Steel?

Here is the platform for you to meet them! 

RAIF, which has been watering India's budding Robert Downey Jr's since it's inception is here to enlighten us during this kurukshetra.. 

Get a live experience of all the latest robotics advancements around the world at one place. 

Play with the robots in the gaming arena and get to know more about them from the best in India!


Dates - February 18, 19, 20.
Venue - K!arnival Zone.
